title: Collar, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered on plain weave; bobbin lace
description: Sheer white collar with white embroidery in a field pattern of small floral sprigs and a side border of repeating delicate floral forms. Outer edge trimmed with bobbin lace.
